articles.title: Senior Vice-President of NBC of U.S. Here
articles.content:
Senior Vice-President of NBC of U.S. Here
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Verdi David Joseph, senior vice-president of the NBC of the U.S., and his party arrived here on Tuesday.

articles.title: 2017 Inter-provincial Mass Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
2017 Inter-provincial Mass Sports Contest Opens 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The 2017 Inter-provincial Mass Sports Contest opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Tuesday.
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Kwang Ho, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned, provincial (municipal) players and cheer squads, and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Choe Hwi said in an opening address that the participants should make good scores in the contest so as to give full play to the revolutionary mettle and militant spirit of the Korean people dashing towards the victory of socialism like the wind.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there was a women's volleyball game between South Phyongan Province and Nampho City.

articles.title: Delegation of Board of Directors of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Board of Directors of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation led by Vice-Chairman Keith Bennet came here on Tuesday.
					 Also arriving were Gilardino Roberto,, member of the Foundation, and his companion, and Thomas Lichter, member of the Foundation.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from N. Enkhbayar, chairman of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party (MPRP), on Oct. 9.
					 The message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the Korean working people on the 72nd anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 It expressed belief that the friendly cooperation between the two parties would further deepen in a stable and wide-range way, saying that the DPRK will thrive and develop forever.

articles.title: Amateur Riders Competition Takes Place in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Amateur Riders Competition Takes Place in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- An amateur riders competition will take place at the Mirim Riding Club in Pyongyang in spring (April) and autumn (October) every year, Ri Tong Jun, secretary general of the Korean Equestrian Association, told KCNA.
					 The competition is aimed to arouse social interest in riding and develop equestrian skills, he added.
					
					 The first autumn amateur riders competition was held on Sunday amid the concern of the working people.
					
					 The competition brought together members of the association and 40 amateurs of 12 years and upward.

articles.title: "Encyclopedia of Dermatology" Published in DPRK
articles.content:
"Encyclopedia of Dermatology" Published in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The four-volume "Encyclopedia of Dermatology" was published in the DPRK.
					 The book comprehensively systematizes successes and experiences made in the field of dermatology of the country. It deals with the world's data on skin diseases and more than 1 500 other diseases and therapies.
					
					 It consists of 45 chapters of 9 parts. Vol. 1 carries the introduction to dermatology, Vol. 2 skin inflammation and adnexitis, Vol. 3 skin infection and skin diseases caused by environment and Vol. 4 dermatoma and constitutional diseases and skin.
					
					 The book was written and complied by tens of competent medical personnel, professors and doctors of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, Korea General Red Cross Hospital, Ministry of Public Health Skin-disease Preventive Centre and provincial people's hospitals across the country.
					
					 Kim Sang Gun, director of the Ministry of Public Health Skin-disease Preventive Centre, told KCNA that "Encyclopedia of Dermatology", the first book of the medical science circle of Korea, would make a contribution to developing specialization in dermatology.

articles.title: DIU, Root of Workers' Party of Korea
articles.content:
DIU, Root of Workers' Party of Korea
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- October 17, Juche 15 (1926), is recorded as a significant day in the modern history of Korea.
					 That day, President Kim Il Sung in his teens formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU), the root of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the eternal foundation of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Forming the new revolutionary organization, he delivered a historic report "Let Us Overthrow Imperialism".
					
					 In his report, he indicated that as the DIU regards it as its mission to overthrow imperialism both in name and reality, its programme should raise it as its immediate task to defeat Japanese imperialism, the sworn enemy of the Korean people and achieve the liberation and independence of Korea and as its ultimate goal to build socialism and communism in Korea and, furthermore, destroy all imperialism and build communism in the world.
					
					 The formation of the DIU became the starting point for founding the Juche-type revolutionary party and the programme of the DIU served as a basis for the programme of the WPK, and DIU's principle of independence as the principle of the party building and activities. And the revolutionaries of the rising generation trained by the DIU became the backbone for founding the party.
					
					 The WPK has won victories as it has consistently adhered to the ideology of the DIU in each period and at each stage of the developing revolution.
					
					 All the lines and policies advanced by the WPK after the liberation of Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule (August 15, 1945) have been carried out, displaying their tremendous vitality. Among them are the policy on agrarian reform, the policy of agricultural cooperativization, the basic line of socialist economic construction and the line of simultaneously developing the economic construction and defence capabilities.
					
					 Despite many-fold difficulties and trials in the closing years of the last century, the WPK gave full play to its ever-victorious might under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 As it is holding respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem, the WPK is strengthening into the great party adhering to the line of Songun (military-first) revolution and the powerful and militant party with strong sense of unity and rich experience, true to the ideas and intentions of the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Trump Ridiculed for His Balderdash: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Trump Ridiculed for His Balderdash: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S., much upset by the DPRK's super offensive, is getting evermore frantic in the provocative moves.
					 Now huge strategic assets including the nuclear-powered aircraft carriers Ronald Reagan and Theodore Roosevelt, the nuclear submarines Tucson and Michigan and B-1B strategic bombers are heading toward south Korea and its vicinity while Trump is unhesitatingly spitting out such frantic remarks as "total destruction" and "calm before a storm."
					
					 This is the last-ditch efforts of the U.S. driven to the tight corner owing to the DPRK's rapid development of nuclear force and its toughest counteraction. 
					
					 It is Trump's wicked intention to check the DPRK's strategic measures for rounding off the state nuclear force by making a fuss about something serious happening and aggravate tension to the maximum and, furthermore, force those countries uneasy about the present situation to impose sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and tide over the ruling crisis at home and abroad.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have much witnessed bravado and cunningness of the U.S. through the standoff with it for more than 70 years.
					
					 Nothing will be more foolish than to try to use the old method, which worked on small and weak countries bereft of guts and pluck, for the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has been fully ready for all the U.S. is resorting to including sanctions, pressure and military option as it has the tremendous nuclear force for self-defence and irresistible strength of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 The desperate efforts made by the U.S. and its vassal forces to block the advance of the DPRK, vociferating about "threat to global peace and security" would only make the DPRK harden the faith that the road chosen by it is quite right and it should take to this road to the last.
					
					 Trump thought that his reckless remarks would startle the DPRK. However, it is not the DPRK but the U.S. society which is trembling in fear.
					
					 The prevailing fear and uneasiness in the U.S. society is ever increasing as the U.S. has no means and capability to cope with the DPRK's strike, which is becoming a hard reality.
					
					 No wonder, Americans obsessed with war-phobia are vying with each other in buying foods and goods for emergency use to save their lives.
					
					 Trump causes troubles by spitting out reckless remarks without any calculation. It was very ridiculous for Trump to frighten the DPRK by his maniac deposition. 
					
					 The DPRK will never stop even a moment the efforts to build up the nuclear force until it has achieved equilibrium of force with the U.S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Steadily Pushing Forward Economic Construction and Building of Nuclear Force
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Steadily Pushing Forward Economic Construction and Building of Nuclear Force
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK will surely win the final victory in the standoff with the U.S., holding aloft the banner of line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The strategic line of the Workers' Party of Korea provides a powerful guarantee for steady victories and an engine for creation and leap forward. This is the faith deeply cherished by the army and people of the DPRK which have advanced along the Juche-oriented road of socialism under the banner of developing the two fronts, smashing the enemies' nuclear war moves and sanctions and pressure.
					
					 Within a few years the DPRK created eye-opening miracles in building up the state nuclear force, weathering all sorts of difficulties and ordeals by its own strength under the banner of the strategic line. The DPRK proudly emerged a world military power that has strategic submarine-launched ballistic missiles, H-bomb and ICBM.
					
					 A fundamental change has taken place in the comprehensive strength and strategic position of the DPRK and the confrontation structure on the Korean peninsula and the world political landscape have undergone dramatic changes.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, frightened by the power of the DPRK making long strides under the banner of the strategic line, are making desperate efforts to deprive the DPRK of its sovereignty and rights to existence and development.
					
					 However, the reckless behavior of the Trump group is nothing but the death-bed struggle of the losers who are panic-stricken by the might of the DPRK.
					
					 Nothing can break the faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to win one victory after another, holding fast to the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force under any kaleidoscopic situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Warmongers' Provocation Moves Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Warmongers' Provocation Moves Slammed
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, puppet Defense Minister of south Korea Song Yong Mu showed himself at a puppet army training camp where he incited a war fever against the DPRK. He, aboard AWACS, had command communications with units of the ground, naval and air forces to cry out for "strong counteraction against someone's possible provocation" and "full readiness".
					 Meanwhile, the puppet military gangsters staged a live firing drill of Taurus and SLAM-ER for strike on the DPRK's core facilities and worked to develop carbon fiber bomb aimed at destroying its electric grid.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary says that this brings to light once again the sinister intention of traitors who are working hard to put the whole Korean nation into a nuclear disaster as war servants of the U.S.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The acutest situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula owing to the hysterics of old lunatic Trump who continues to let out heinous remarks, resorting to military gambling.
					
					 It is clear to everyone that if a war breaks out on the peninsula due to the U.S. war hysteria, south Korea will not go scot-free.
					
					 It goes without saying that the reckless provocation moves of the puppet military warmongers including traitor Song Yong Mu are as foolish an act as fanning up the war hysteria of the U.S. seeking a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces should act with discretion, aware of the warnings of news analysts that if they provoke the DPRK, south Korea would be scorched in a moment.

articles.title: Minju Joson Calls for Taking Serious Note of U.S. High-handed and Arbitrary Practices
articles.content:
Minju Joson Calls for Taking Serious Note of U.S. High-handed and Arbitrary Practices
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday cites facts to show that the world's point of view on the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula has changed since Trump hurled a torrent of abuse at the DPRK at the UN arena.
					 The commentary says:
					
					 Lots of politicians, experts on Korean affairs and lawyers around the world are making efforts to grasp the essence of the nuclear issue on the peninsula from geopolitical, legal and moral points of view.
					
					 As the world's wise politicians say, it is necessary to find a correct solution to the nuclear issue after taking into full account the historical circumstances of the issue, the legal validity, etc. as it is a sensitive political affair directly related to the destiny of the world.
					
					 From this point of view, we can not but comment on the injustice of the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK, the root cause of the nuclear issue on the peninsula.
					
					 As universally known, the U.S. has left no means untried to stifle the DPRK by force of arms for decades, denying even its existence.
					
					 Although U.S. governments altered several times and masters of the White House were replaced, the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK has never been stopped.
					
					 To our regret, the international arena and the UNSC in particular have never taken issue with the U.S. violation of international laws.
					
					 From a point of view of world peace and security and the development of mankind, what should be put into question at present is the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices for imperialist domination strategy, rather than the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Why U.S. Tries to Resume Nuclear Test
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Why U.S. Tries to Resume Nuclear Test
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Recently the Trump group of the U.S. is going to resume the nuclear test suspended for the past 25 years, as part of the scheme to strengthen its nuclear combat force, Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary.
					 After Trump took office, the U.S. is vocal again about the demand for the resumption of nuclear test, along with stepping up the upgrading of aging nukes and development of new-type nuclear weapons to cope with the DPRK's bolstering of its nuclear force, timed to coincide with Trump's call for "the ability to discern the U.S. power" and "its beefing up of nuclear capability".
					
					 The Trump group's attempt to resume the nuclear test is just dangerous moves to ignite a nuclear war so as to realize its ambition to dominate the world with nukes of tyranny, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The U.S. is the only nuclear war criminal as it developed nuclear weapons for the first time in the world and inflicted untold nuclear disaster upon humankind with nukes.
					
					 The U.S. is an empire of evil that should have been eliminated from the earth long ago after being given severe punishment of the international community for its thrice-cursed crimes such as gravely infringing on global peace and security.
					
					 Nevertheless, it is talking about the resumption of nuclear test for the sake of what it called a "global peace and security", though it should sit in the dock as the world's worst-ever nuclear criminal. This is a brazen-faced act of making a mockery of the international community.
					
					 The U.S. moves to dominate the world by force of nukes have reached their height under the reign of old lunatic Trump.
					
					 This is a revelation of the U.S.-style brigandish logic that all the countries of the world should live like slaves before its nuclear sticks or die.

articles.title: Settlement of Past Will Promise Bright Future of Japan: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Settlement of Past Will Promise Bright Future of Japan: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Days ago, a Japanese delegate groaned that the fact Japan had forced 200 000 Korean women into sexual slavery during World War II was a groundless fiction at the meeting of the Third Committee of the 72nd Session of UN General Assembly, the agenda of which is "Advancement of Women".
					 Japan's attempt to shun settlement of its hideous past crimes is a extra large criminal act that deserves the curse and accusation of all people as it is a thrice-cursed act of stabbing the Korean people in the breast, Minju Joson Tuesday says in a commentary, adding:
					
					 The Japanese delegate must be the very one who received education in distorted history which tells lies that the preceding generations sacrificed themselves for "peace in the East" and Japan devotedly committed itself to "freedom" and "independence" of neighboring countries.
					
					 Due to those guys who are recklessly wagging their tongue, failing to discern which is just and true, Japan's image hits the bottom and its diplomatic isolation becomes worse with each passing day.
					
					 It is not fortuitous that the world calls Japan a politically immature dwarf.
					
					 When Japan has an axe to grind and resorts to sleight of hand with its past crimes as now, its action will only cast a darker shadow over its future.
					
					 Japan had better keep in mind that it can never cover up the history of its hideous unethical crimes and write it off, and it should make a bold decision to settle the past.
					
					 Proactive settlement of past will promise a rosy future for Japan.

articles.title: S. Korea: Probe into Political Suppression during Park Geun Hye's Regime Urged
articles.content:
S. Korea: Probe into Political Suppression during Park Geun Hye's Regime Urged
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea on Oct. 13 demanded the south Korean puppet authorities probe the truth behind the suppression of civic and social organizations and operational politics during the Park Geun Hye regime, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 The organization blasted the Park Geun Hye regime for resorting to political suppression of the council and other civic and social bodies and even victims of sexual slavery opposed to the agreement on the "settlement" of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Exposes Secret of Humiliating Agreement
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Exposes Secret of Humiliating Agreement
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on Oct. 11 revealed that the Park Geun Hye group covered its agreement on increase of funds for U.S. military presence in south Korea.
					 The paper said that the buildings and facilities the U.S. built in south Korea at the expense from south Korea are nothing but ghostlike ones the existence of which is not known to the people and the regime of south Korea.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Benin
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Benin
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A seminar on respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work took place in Benin on October 5 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday.
					 Present there were personages of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Cotonou Institute of Journalism and popular masses in Benin.
					
					 At the seminar, the chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" mad briefing on the main content of Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party." He said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il conducted energetic ideo-theoretical activities and thus made Kimilsungism shine as the great guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He devoted his all to the country's prosperity and people's happiness with warm love for them.
					
					 At the seminar several personages lauded his revolutionary career and stressed that Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is now strengthening the WPK into the gloriouas party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism held a seminar on Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the WPK on the Work of its Central Committee on the same day.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Celebrated in North Europe
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Celebrated in North Europe
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting of Nordic progressive political parties and friendly organizations took place in Sweden on October 7 to celebrate the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On display at its venue was an art piece depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and photos showing their revolutionary careers and exploits.
					
					 There were also their works and books and photos introducing the achievements made by the Korean army and people in building a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Present at the meeting were personages and members of Swedish, Danish and Finnish progressive political parties, organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and Juche idea study organizations, and the DPRK ambassador to Sweden and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the art piece depicting the great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, said that the WPK was founded on October 10, 1945 but its historic roots were provided during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle led by Kim Il Sung and that the WPK has led the Korean people's struggle to victory for more than 70 years.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, mentioned the history of the WPK which has always emerged victorious under the guidance of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 A solidarity statement was issued to support the Korean people's just cause.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean film "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un".

articles.title: Trump's Remarks Blasted by Bangladeshi Political Parties
articles.content:
Trump's Remarks Blasted by Bangladeshi Political Parties
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Jatiya Party, Socialist Party and the Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) of Bangladesh issued a joint statement on October 1 in denunciation of Trump's wild remarks for "total destruction" of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Shortly ago, Trump fully revealed his true colors before the world community as a political rogue and gangster by crying out for "total destruction" of the DPRK at the United Nations General Assembly.
					
					 The U.S. is a harasser of peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 Trump is running amuck, utterly ignorant of the Korean army and people.
					
					 The DPRK is an invincible politico-ideological power in which the army and people are united close around their leader and a military giant possessed of even H-bomb and ICBM.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the struggle to defend the country's sovereignty and dignity and right to existence and ensure peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Llegan a Pyongyang el vicepresidente de NBC y su comitiva
articles.content:
Llegan a Pyongyang el vicepresidente de NBC y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- El vicepresidente de la cadena norteamericana NBC, Verdi David Joseph, y su comitiva llegaron el dia 17 a esta capital.

articles.title: Iniciada la competencia masiva interprovincial nacional-2017
articles.content:
Iniciada la competencia masiva interprovincial nacional-2017
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang la ceremonia de inauguracion de la competencia masiva interprovincial nacional-2017 con la participacion del vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Hwi, el vicepremier Jon Kwang Ho, el ministro de Deportes Kim Il Guk, los funcionarios interesados, los jugadores y miembros de grupos de hinchas de las provincias (o ciudades subordinadas directamente al centro) y los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					A esta cita deportiva, que se efectuara en el Estadio Kim Il Sung, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang y otros estadios y gimnasios capitalitos, asistiran los trabajadores de distintos estratos, las amas de casa, los jovenes y ninos escolares y los deportistas, seleccionados en esta capital y en las provincias (las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro). 
					
					Se realizaran los juegos de la rama de deportes especializados en las 5 disciplinas como futbol y baloncesto, los de la rama de deportes masivos en las 6 como voleibol, tenis y Taekwondo y los de recreo en las 3. 
					
					Al pronunciar el discurso de la ocasion, Choe Hwi dijo que los jugadores deben obtener buenos resultados en los juegos para manifestar el impetu revolucionario y combativo del pueblo coreano que marcha a galopes hacia la victoria final del socialismo. 
					
					Luego, se realizo el partido de voleibol (f) entre la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur y la ciudad de Nampho.

articles.title: Se entablaran dos veces al ano los juegos de aficionados a equitacion, opina Ri Tong Jun
articles.content:
Se entablaran dos veces al ano los juegos de aficionados a equitacion, opina Ri Tong Jun
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ACNC) -- Se realizaran en la primavera (abril) y el otono (octubre) de cada ano los juegos de aficionados a la equitacion en el capitalino Club de Equitacion de Mirim.
					Asi dijo a los periodistas el secretario general de la Asociacion Coreana de Equitadores, Ri Tong Jun, quien continuo:
					
					La cita tiene objeto de elevar la atencion de la sociedad sobre la equitacion y desarrollar las tecnologias ecuestres del pais.
					
					Se efectuo el dia 15 el primer juego otonal de aficionados a la equitacion bajo la atencion de los trabajadores.
					
					Alli, participaron los maestrantes de la asociacion y 40 aficionados con mas de 12 anos de edad.
